targets.query: SELECT sum(Confirmed)-sum(Recovered)-sum(Deaths) FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)
SELECT sum("Deaths") *100 / sum("Confirmed") FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("Recovered") * 100 / sum("Confirmed" FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)
SELECT last("Confirmed") AS "metric" FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "country", "lat", "long"
SELECT last("Deaths") AS "metric" FROM "autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "country", "lat", "long"
SELECT last("Recovered") FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(72h), "country"
SELECT 100* sum(Confirmed)/ 7781492808 FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(null)

targets.query:
SELECT sum("Confirmed") AS "Confirmed", sum("Deaths") AS "Deaths", sum("Recovered") AS "Recovered", 
100*sum(Deaths)/sum(Confirmed) as "Fatality_Ratio", 100*sum(Recovered)/sum(Confirmed) as "Recovery_Ratio", 
sum("Confirmed")-sum(Deaths)-sum(Recovered) as "Remaining" FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h) fill(previous)
SELECT sum("Confirmed") -sum(Death)-sum(Recovered) FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "country" fill(null)
SELECT sum("Confirmed") FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE ("country" = 'Germany') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "country" fill(null)
SELECT sum("Confirmed") FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE ("country" = 'Germany') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "country" fill(null)
SELECT sum("Confirmed") FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE ("country" = 'Germany') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "country" fill(null)
SELECT sum("Confirmed") FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE ("country" = 'Germany') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "country" fill(null)

panels.content:
# Thanks and More
Thanks to CSSEGISandData for providing figures on an daily base via https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19.

The information of population End 2019 have been taken from https://databank.worldbank.org/reports.aspx?source=2&series=SP.POP.TOTL&country=#advancedDownloadOptions.

appNew.js to download the files, convert and upload the information into an influxDB is available on https://github.com/smartcuc/COVID-19.

Sponsored by Ruediger

# Get well soon

targets.query: SELECT sum("Confirmed") FROM "covid19"."autogen"."CoronaNew" WHERE ("country" = 'Germany') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "country" fill(null)
